title: Return
description: The item's information within the RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization).

xdm:returnStatus.title: Return Item Status
xdm:returnStatus.description: Status of returned item (e.g. Pending, Approved).

xdm:returnReason.title: Return Reason
xdm:returnReason.description: Reason why return is requested for item.

xdm:returnQuantityRequested.title: Return Quantity Requested
